website_summaries.verdict: These cute and colorful little bears are a wonderful sorting and counting tool for younger kids. A novel introduction to color recognition and basic math.
pros: Vibrant colors appeal to kids of all ages
Assists with the learning of several skills, including counting, pattern-making, early math, matching, color recognition, and more
Handling the tongs, bears, and cups helps polish fine motor skills and improve hand-eye coordination
cons: Some parents felt the bears could be a bit larger

customer_reviews.title: My toddler LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: These are better than any of the counter bears I’ve seen in the stores, especially for the price. I’ve had them for a while and they have held up well. Everything is good sturdy plastic. The colors are vibrant. They are great for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fun, bright colors, multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2yr old to practice sorting and for my 7yr old to count out big numbers when doing her math homework. They are bright fun colors, easy to see, and a fun addition to add to your child’s math homework when adding and subtracting big numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenisa

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year olds favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2 year olds favorite toy. It keeps her so entertained and it helped us teach her her colors. I’ll definitely be giving these as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these little bears!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 9 year old both love these little sorting bears. My kids will sit and make-up games and count and sort them. I really like this kit because of the price, and the little case keeps everything together. Wonderful product, great quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2.5 yo he loves it!! The bears are the perfect size for little fingers to grasp and the tongs/tweezers that came with it are flexible enough for a 2 year old but not so flexible that they break easily. The case is great too. Nothing worse than sixty small plastic bears all over the playroom. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them will recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Can be used for learning to count or learning colors I love them and baby loves them more.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Acosta

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: I had these when I was in school, I had to get them for my kiddos too. My daughter loves these and the colors are bright and it is all made very good and heavy. Very good quailty and buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality and value my 2 year old son loves them and they are great for teaching counting and colors
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great for OT
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's OT office as a thank you for their work. All of the kids love them, no matter what the age. It is very easy to customize their use, and the kids love to put them in the little carrying case when they are done for the day. I would absolute buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty1776

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Vivid colors and super cute teddy bears! Fun to learn math
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Verified purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the idea of different color bears and sort to matching color cup. Good One.
customer_reviews.author: Kannu

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The rainbow counting bears with matching cups has been great for out 2 year old's fine motor. Would recommend to others wanting to strengthen fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Davis

customer_reviews.title: The number of toy bears cannot be reached
customer_reviews.text: This toy bear, the price is a bit high, the number of bears has not reached, unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Xiu feng lin

customer_reviews.title: Great for educational activities
customer_reviews.text: Great for color sorting, counting, naming and identifying colors, and using fine motor skills with tongs. Kids love participating in activities with these little bears!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: No for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but my kid didn’t like it he just like play with the cups
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, large cups, easy cleanup and it’s own storage!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Prelle

customer_reviews.title: Just watch them not to put in mouth
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and my kid loved it!!! He’s starting to learn his colors and it’s a big help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! The colors are bright and everything is made of durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves sorting and colors. This is perfect. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: shawn ross

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect sorting toy
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old granddaughter loves this so much! It is very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Robisky

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, compact and easy to use, we use ours while eating out to give the toddler some toys to play with. gives us some time to eat without having to get up out of our seats. Kids love counting them or sorting by colors. easy to grab and durable. educational and easy.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for home learning.
customer_reviews.text: my 2 year old was counting and sorting in no time. Great amount of colors and came with an awesome bag to store everything in.
customer_reviews.author: marcus hunnicutt

product_meta.title: KABOOCHY Rainbow Counting Bears with Matching Sorting Cups and Storage Container 68pc Set. Quality Colorful Toy Counters for Kids to Learn Mathematics Games, STEM, Montessori Matching Game
product_meta.description: KABOOCHY Rainbow Counting Bears with 6 Matching Sorting Cups, 60 Bear Counters, Tongs and Storage Container
feature_bullets: LEARNING TOY FOR KIDS AGED 2 PLUS – It’s the perfect Game for Toddlers, and children in Pre School, Kindergarten right through to First Graders. Kids will love sorting and counting these cute and colorful bears, or just tossing them into the stackable cups! Great STEM educational math manipulatives and Montessori Learning Toys, and they are suitable for kids aged 2, 3, 4 or even older kids. A must-have for home schooling and a great resource for teachers’ classroom.

FUN & EDUCATIONAL –A fun way to teach your students basic math concepts including addition, subtraction, and even multiplication before they even start school. Using the tweezers to pick up the bears, they can count them, sort them into color groups, match them with their cup and put them into colour patterns. And with their imagination, each bear can have a name for pretend play!

DEVELOPMENT SKILLS – Besides heaps of Guaranteed Fun, your child is also developing early learning skills which is imperative for growing. It helps them develop Numeracy Skills, STEM skills, Problem Solving Skills, Color Recognition, Fine Motor Skills as well as Hand Eye Coordination. It also encourages Imagination, Inspires Creativity and Promotes Self Esteem! They are particularly helpful for children with autism, learning disabilities or special needs, and a great for occupational therapy.

COMPLETE BUNDLE – Our Comprehensive Set includes 60 bear counters, with 10 in each colour (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue and Purple), 6 Stackable Cups, a pair of Tweezers and also a Clear Plastic Storage Container for you to conveniently store them.

ONLY THE BEST QUALITY – This product is non-toxic, BPA-Free, Lead-Free, contains No Phthalate, so they are safe for your little ones. They are made with hard plastic which are Sturdy and Durable, with Smooth Finished pieces and are easy to grasp. NOTE: The bears are 1.05” tall, so Adult Supervision is required when there are children under the age of 3.
